name: Strange Brigade
description: Embark on an exotic journey into danger in this rip-roaring 1930s third person adventure for 1-4 players! Encounter pulse-pounding action, treacherous traps and tales of derring-do!
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G  or Intel CPU Core i3-2100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce 750 Ti (2GB) Storage: 35 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel CPU Core i7-3770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon RX570 or Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 35 GB available space
